channel.title: [Question] 614 Client Cache [Question]
channel.description:
If i put cache in C:/Drive then how does other players play, do they also need to put in c:/drive to play?
Cache Link: YOU DONT NEED TO DOWNLOAD THIS JUST LOOK AT MY RUN.BAT TUT (place it in your c:/ and you wont get run errors!) : http://dl.dropbox.com/u/48084005/cache.zip
